name: DailycastNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, play Daily cast news". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Dailycast Syndicated News Service is trusted by hundreds of digital and terrestrial radio networks worldwide. The news is presented with no slant, no left or right spin. Just direct, specific news that gets the word across. What stations want and what most listeners want.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
